title: "What Do Men Find Attractive?" Explained Through Evolutionary Psychology #shorts
description:
Here's a clip from a podcast episode with Sabrina Calvo and Brianna Gonva #shorts  
Full Clip 🔗: https://youtu.be/cU4AJYYYfe0

Sabrina Calvo (IG: @sabriina.calvo) and Brianna Gonva (IG: @briannagonva) are Miami-based models and brand ambassadors.  

Sabrina is a Venezuelan swimwear model who's worked for Zumba and Fashion Nova.  

Brianna is a Mexican model who's worked for Telemundo and Monster Energy.  

They discuss the changes in the modeling industry due to covid, the difficulties of posing in swimwear on Instagram or TikTok, how to date an influencer, cheating spouses, monogamy and human evolution, communications in a relationship, chivalry, their love of food and tequila, their love of animals and how Sabrina has absolutely no red flags.

———————————————————
Ready to build a network of amazing women and high-status men? 

Michael’s Men of Action Mentoring Program is a Master’s course dedicated to helping people elevate their social lives by becoming higher status and building elite social circles.

Click the link to learn how you can start living the high-status social life you always wanted: https://m.moamentoring.com/podcast
————————————————————

Subscribe on Youtube: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/MichaelSartain

Listen on Apple Podcast: 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-michael-sartain-podcast/id1579791157

Listen on Spotify: 
https://open.spotify.com/show/2faAYwvDD9Bvkpwv6umlPO?si=8Q3ak9HnSlKjuChsTXr6YQ&dl_branch=1

channel_info.description:
🎙Host of The Michael Sartain Podcast 

🔥Teaching you how to build a network of desirable women and high-status men

transcription: {"text": "Men are more attracted to women that look the most fertile, which typically is young. Which is the curves. So it is the curves, but let's look at something else. Let's look at the contrapositive of what you said. When women go through menopause, there's studies that show that men can smell it. They can tell when their wife is no longer fertile. They can sense, not literally smell it, but through pheromones, they can sense that their wife's not fertile. And you will see, the study shows men dating the secretary, buying the red Ferrari. It coincides with menopause, and it's really shocking. So the opposite of fertility, which would be menopause, would trigger something like that. So as far as fertility, here's a couple things. Facial symmetry shows good genetics. Long hair. So a lot of women have fake hair. You notice, if you have a woman who's 50 years old and she has fake hair, you can't tell how old she is from behind. Hip to waist ratio, nice skin, all these kind of things. You're right. They are signs of fertility. That's exactly right. And then youth is the other one. Breast implants are therefore a sign of youth. Same thing with Botox. Same thing with liposuction. Those are things to show youth, essentially. Which again, like what you said, shows more the likelihood of being able to carry a child.
